item.title: About Me - All Things Tech
item.description: MASON COMPUTERS spawned in 2014 when I began my journey in software development. Now that I am about to graduate with my B.S. in Computer Science with a focus in Cyber Security, the time has come to give this site a purpose. On this site I am going to try to keep up to date notes, tutorials, and logs for the projects I am currently working on. The site is built using Hugo, a static site generator.
